HDG.IM.content: what does “world” mean? [cf. Derrida in ATIA]

HDG.BC.content: “Ground-concepts” calls us to come to stand where a footing & a permanence are granted, where all decisions are made, but also where indecisiveness borrows its hiding places [relate to Derrida, undecidable]

HDG.BC.content: clock stops, we become aware of “is,” an interruption intrudes on speaking [attention beyond time?] > can only experience interruption hypothetically [yes! Derrida, Nietzsche, bell tolls]

HDG.BC.content: relinquishing thought most deplorable way for thought to accomplish task [re: refusing to rely on “paradox”]: give up question of Being as pseudoquestion, or acknowledge exposed impasse (“aporia”) (must come to terms w/ it in some way) [how to treat Derrida’s aporia?] > impasse that Being brings w/ it is its mark of distinction (eigene Auszeichnung)[mark prior to Being? differance] > acc. Heidegger, to call impasse (Ausweglosigkeit) “aporia” is to close eyes at impasse [?] [Heidegger beyond Derrida?]

HDG.BT.content: [destruction not deconstruction] taking question of Being as our clue, we are to destroy traditional content of ancient ontology, until we arrive at primordial experiences [utterly impossible for Derrida] that achieved 1st ways of determining nature of Being (the ways that have guided us ever since [our destiny])

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.FS.content: matter (Sache) itself is sole authority, in seminar we work in common, text is only a means (Mittel), not an end (Ziel) [cf. Derrida] > in genuine seminar, teacher learns the most, he must listen rightly (rechte Hören) to the text > nothing ever to be believed, must be experienced [secret (Geheimnis) of seminar, be able to read Hegel’s whole book]

HDG.FS.content: ontological determination of standing reserve not permanence but orderability, persistent standing-at-one’s-disposal (zur-Verfügung-stehen)—for consumption in planning of whole > replaceability (Ersetzbarkeit) essential to way of being today, every being essentially replaceable [cf. Derrida on substitution], Ersetzbarsein > for example: fashion > time becomes current affairs (Aktualität), continual novelty of incessant change [obsession w/ new] [Heidegger wonders whether May ’68 realized all this]

HDG.MA.content: [Derrida beyond Heidegger] [Heidegger describes the homelessness of those who watch Television, listen to radio, go to movies] the rootedness (Bodenständigkeit), the autochthony, of man threatened today at its core: loss of autochthony springs from spirit of age in which we were born: the atomic age (atom bomb: its most conspicuous symbol)

HDG.CCP.content: the region gathers, each to each, while resting in itself: “regioning is a gathering and re-sheltering (versammelnde Zurückbergen) for an expanded resting (Beruhen) in an abiding (Weile)” [Gegnet], in Gegnet, openness is halted and held [Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.CCP.content: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.DL.content: [re: “Expression and Meaning (Ausdruck und Bedeutung [double takes on Erscheinung]”] I was concerned to make visible (sichtbar machen) das ganz Andere [the totally other], which [at that time], I had only an obscure (dunkel) or confused intimation (verworren Geahnte) [Derrida beyond Heidegger: can’t make totally other visible]

HDG.DL.content: Die Achtsamkeit auf die Spuren, die das Denken in seinen Quellbereich weisen [give heed to trails (traces) that direct thinking back to region of its source] [for Derrida the traces are the source in such a way that there is no source to think back to] > do you find these traces? > I find them because they’re not of my making (stammen), because they’re rarely discernible, like the wind-borne echo of a distant call (fernen Zurufes) [annihilation of trace]

HDG.LP.content: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

HDG.LP.content: Geschlecht (kin, kind, generation): a human cast away (verschlagene) from Menschenwesen, stamped (geprägte) in one cast (einem Schlag) > Geschlecht: both mankind as a whole and kinship of race, tribe, family, all of these stamped in the duality of the sexes (Zwiefache der Geschlechter), decomposed form of man, man unsettled (entsetzte) > a curse (Fluch) has struck man [cf. Derrida on Geschlecht, 2nd blow of sexes] > not duality (Zwiefache) but discord (Zwietracht) is the curse

HDG.LP.content: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static

HDG.LP.content: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]

HDG.WL.content: is Saying the stream of stillness that forms (bildet)/joins (verbindet) its own two banks (Ufer): the Saying and our saying after it (unser Nachsagen)? [in forming joins: contra Derrida]

HDG.EC.content: the coming: that before (voraus) which nothing can be thought, the unprethinkable (das Unvordenkliche) [cf. Derrida to-come] > what heals can’t be set forth in propositional statements (in aussagenden Sätzen darstellen), but only conversationally surmised (gesprächsweise vermuten) [Derrida would say it can only be marked on the margins, nor would he call it what heals]

HDG.OHF.content: [cf. OPEN in Derrida] historical consciousness is “there,” brings itself into open publicity (Öffentlichkeit) w/ a definite self-interpretation (bestimmten Selbstauslegung)

HDG.OHF.content: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares
